name: Extract PDF Info with PDF.co
description:
This template enables you to extract information from PDF documents using PDF.co within Make.com. Automate the extraction of text, images, metadata, and more from your PDF files. Ideal for processing invoices, reports, forms, and any documents where data extraction is needed.

About PDF.co:
PDF.co specializes in PDF processing solutions. This template was created by PDF.co and has not been tested by Make. For support, contact support@pdf.co.
